msbt.message: Why, hello there. My name is . I just moved here today. And you are? Oh! You're !The lovely folks at Resident Services told me that someone else was moving here today as well. That someone must be you, my dear!Well, this can mean only one thing you and I are destined to become the best of friends, !

You're , right?You know, EVERYONE is talking about the island's newest arrival. That would be YOU, darling! Well, I'm , and it's a pleasure to meet you at last!You knowI have a sense for these things, and I can tell already that we're going to be fast friends!

Well, well! Let me guess. You're that I've been hearing so much about! Oh, it's just a little bit of harmless island gossip. I've heard nothing but good things, I assure you. Anyhoo, it's so nice to finally meet you! I'm . So pleased to have you here.

Why, hello. So nice to meet you. You must be new to the island.I'm . And you are?<10_4 /> ! What a delightful name you have!Names say so much about a person, don't you think?Well, , I say you and I are going to be the most FABULOUS friends!

Oh dear—I have a cold right now, so you shouldn't come too close!And here you are to introduce yourself. What terrible timing!Well, my name is . I'd love to gab with youas soon as I won't get you sick. !

And who might you be?<10_4 /> A pleasure to meet you. I just moved here today myself. Call me . I take it you live on this island? You know, I moved here because it's quite the up-and-coming destination. Well, once I'm done unpacking, I'd love to have you over for a chat. I'm looking forward to it already!

Oh, feathers! This place is a terrible mess! How embarrassing!I have a good excuse, my dear. I just moved here today, after all. Still, I hate for you to see it like this. Goodness, where are my manners?! Your name is? <10_4 />So nice to meet you. My name is . Now, I don't mean to be rude, but let's continue this chat once I've put everything in its proper place.

We haven't been introduced yet, have we? I'm . I'm still new to the island myself.And you arewait, don't tell me<10_4 /> ! That's it, right? At last I get to say hello! Well, I'll be sure to make ALL kinds of trouble for you. That's what friends are for, darling!

Well, hello! You live here on this island too, don't you? My name is .I'm sorry, your name is?<10_4 /> Oh yes, ! I hope I pronounced that right. This island is lovely, but I'm still trying to feel at home here. It can take time to settle in, I suppose. But look at me, making new friends! Everything will be just fine. I'm sure of it, .

Oh! Aren't you ? I've heard so very much about you! I swear you're the talk of the island.I must apologize for taking so long to introduce myself! A terrible faux pas on my part. Well, I'm . It's a pleasure to finally meet you. I simply can't wait to get to know you better.

Oh dear, you'reyou'reyou're—We're long past due to meet, aren't we? Well, I'm . Pleased to meet you at last. But I'm so sorry you're not meeting me at my best. I've got a terrible cold, you see.I'd hate to spread this plague to you, so once I get better, let's have a proper chat. !

Oh! A pleasure to meet you! I'm .Did tell you the news? They invited me to move here from , you know.You can see what a mess my house is, so I'm in no position to host yet. But visit again soon, darling.

Why, hello. Do you live on this island? Well, I'm . And you are Lovely. Pleased to make your acquaintance, .As it happens, I moved here from at the invitation of . True story! Well, neighbor, now that we've met, we have no choice but to become fast friends and chat all the time!

I'm . I moved here from . So pleased to make your acquaintance. My friend told me SO much about life on this island, I simply had to try it for myself.And they were right! This place is nothing short of sublime! Well, I'm sure you agree, my dear.

Why, I don't believe we've met yet, have we? I'm .Long story short, I moved here from at the invitation of my dear friend . Now, if I'm not mistakenyou must be , yes?I understand that we have a lot in common. So, why don't we be friends? It'll be fun. I promise!

Oh dear Very nice to meet you I'm I'm sorry, but actually I'm rather ill right now. invited me to move here from , so I did, butAAAACHOOO!I tell you, I'm getting sick of being sick. But I won't let a little cold beat me! Let's talk again after I recover, yes?

Why, hello! I'm . So very nice to meet you. Now here's a funny story for you I used to live on , but I met someone who raved about this island and insisted I move here. So I did it! I actually moved! But when I arrived, I found that my so-called friend had moved away. What can I say? My new life got off on the wrong foot. But now that I've met you, things are looking up. I'll be unpacking all day today— but starting tomorrow, let's have some fun, shall we?

Why, I don't believe I've had the pleasure of making your acquaintance. You know, my dear, I used to live on before I was invited to move here Invited by someone who then MOVED AWAY as I was moving here myself.Imagine my surprise! Who does that? I just wanted a fresh start, but instead I got a fresh disappointment. Oh dear, where are my manners? I haven't even introduced myself! I'm . Don't mind me.

Oh dear, I'm sorry. Please excuse me. I don't believe I know you I'm . I lived on before moving here. A friend invited me to your island, butthey're gone! They just up and moved without telling me Ugh, to make matters worse, I came down with a cold. I'm sorry—I appreciate you stopping to say hello. But I need my rest. Let's visit again once I recover.

Strange. I don't recognize your face. Oh dear, how terribly rude of me!Let me explain. You see, I recently moved here from , but I've lived on this island before. That's right, I'm back! And although I'd love to revisit all my old haunts, alas my house iswelllook! Anyhoo, I'm . Pleased to meet you. Once I've tidied up a bit, let's get better acquainted.

Pardon me, but are you , by any chance? My name is . I don't know if you've heard, but I moved here from .Although, truth be told, I actually lived here before that. So it's more like I've returned home.Anyhoo, everyone's told me SO much about you. It's lovely to finally meet you, !

And who might you be?<10_4 /> Ah yes, . I've heard about you from the others.I lived on this island some time ago, but moved to for a while.I missed so very much I simply had to move back. So here I am Goodness! I apologize. I'm a bit sick right nowI wouldn't want you to get sick, my dear. Let's continue our little chat once I'm on the mend.

Oh, do you live here on the island? Why, I do too! I just moved here today! I'm .And you are<10_4 /> , yes?I simply MUST get this tidied up today, but once I've conquered this mess, I want to hear all about you!
Why, it's nice to meet you. I'm . I moved here from recently.And if I'm not mistaken, you're —I can call you , can't I? Well, my dear, it's lovely to meet you.

Excuse me, but by any chance are you ?<10_4 /> I've been hearing so much about you.Oh, but where are my manners? I'm . I recently moved here from . I've been looking forward to meeting you, my dear! So, hello! The pleasure is all mine, .

Oh, hello! We haven't met, have we? I'm .I recently left so I could move to this charming little island of yours. You are , aren't you? I'm so very glad that we finally crossed paths! , my dear, I think we are going to be VERY good friends!

Oh dear, I'm terribly sorry.<10_4 /> I'm . I moved here from . And you're , yes? A pleasure to meet youI must confess, I'm a teensy bit sick right nowI promise to talk your ear off when I'm well again. But for now !

Why, hello there! My name is . I moved to this just today, in fact! It's a funny story, actually. I was talking to while I was on vacation and, well, I hate to toot my own horn, but they said this place could use someone with my sense of style. So here I am, ! I mean, how could I resist an invitation like that? Anyhoo, you are , yes? I'm a bit busy today, but we'll see each other again soon, I hope!

You are, yes?<10_4 /> A pleasure to meet you. I'm , of course. Do you happen to know my dear, dear friend ?I got to chatting with them while I was on vacation, and they went on and on about . To be honest, they practically begged me to move hereso here I am, ! I'm so sorry I didn't say hello sooner. But now that we've met, I cannot wait to tell you all about myself!

Hello! We haven't met, have we? I'm . Perhaps you've heard of me? and I were on a little trip together having a lovely time. And then, before I knew it they had convinced me to move here! They can be VERY convincing, you know. I'm so sorry I didn't say hello sooner. But you know how it is. So many folks to meet, so little time. As soon as I finish tidying up around here, let's chat again, shall we, ?

Well, well, nice to meet you. You must be ! I'm .I met while on vacation. And I'm so glad I did. They convinced me to move here, after all. And just look at this place! I must say, has excellent taste in islands. Anyhoo, my room is a terrible mess and my shoe collection needs organizing, so I can't chat right now. But soon, darling, soon!

Oh dear I don't think I've seen you around. I'm <10_10 />AAACHOOO!<10_9 /> Terribly sorry about that. I'm feeling just awful, . It was who invited me to move here. We met while on vacation, you see. Ahhhahhh<10_10 />AAACHOOO!<10_9 /> This cold is the worst. If you don't mind, let's talk when I'm better.

Hellooo! It's so VERY nice to meet you! I'm , and I moved to this TODAY! Oh! Please pardon me. I realize I'm a bit excitable, but you seeI was on vacation when someone from invited me to move here. But now that I've moved here it seems that certain someone has moved away, ! Needless to say, I was feeling a little lonely, but then you came to say hi, and things started looking up. I don't want to sound desperate, butcan we be friends?

Oh! Hello! We've not met, but my name is .A charming you have here. But let me tell you what is NOT so charming. Meeting a certain someone while on vacation Having that someone convince you to move here Then moving to only to find that they've moved away! The nerve! Anyhoo! It is lovely to meet a friendly face. This gets better and better all the time, .

<10_10 />AAACHOOO!<10_9 />Wewe haven't met yet, have we? My name is . Nice <10_10 />AAACHOOO<10_9 /> to meet you. You know, I met someone from while I was on a little vacation. They convinced me to move here. And so I moved hereand promptly caught aa<10_10 />AAACHOOO<10_9 />cold.Oh dear. If you don't mind, darling, let's talk about life here on Sneeze Island as soon as I'm better.

You live here on the island, yes? And you came by to say hello to little ol' me? Well, aren't you a dear! My name is . I came to just to do a little camping, you see. But then invited me to live here for good. I just moved in TODAY, in fact! I really must get myself organized, but let's chat again real soon, .

Well, hello. I do believe we haven't met. I'm .I must say, as a newish resident of , I am quite impressed. I started out as a mere visitor at the campsite, but invited me to move in for good. They promised I wouldn't be disappointed, and they were right!This place exceeds my extremely high standards in every way, . Anyhoo, I'm glad we got to know one another. I'm sure we will become the BEST of friends.

You're , yes? So we meet at last, .Well, I am , and I'm pleased as pickles to be here!You know, I had a wonderful time here on this island when I was camping, but living here for good is even more fabulous than I imagined! I owe so much for inviting me. I mean, just look at how gorgeous is! Are we not truly lucky to live here?

Why, I've never seen you around here before, have I? Well, either way, I should have introduced myself. My name is , and I haven't always lived here, you see. I started as a mere campsite visitor! I was treating myself to a spa-like vacation when up and asked me to move here for good! And voila! Here I am! And here you are too! I'm sure we will be fast friends in no time, .

Ahhello. A pleasure to meet you. My name isis<10_10 />AAACHOOO!<10_9 />Oh dear, my name is NOT Achoo, it's .Anyhoo, I came to as a campsite visitor. But now I live here, thanks to . They said I should<10_10 />AAACHOOO!<10_9 /> What I meant is said I should move here. So, eh, here I am. Ugh, if only had said there was a cold going around. I'm so sorry to complain. If you don't mind, could you come back when I'm feeling better, ?

Hellooo! It is I, the newest resident to call home! I cannot tell you how happy I am to meet you, my dear. You won't believe what's happened! You see, I came here just to visit the campsite, but was invited to move in for good by an island resident. So I dropped everything and moved hereonly to find that my would-be friend had left! Gone! POOF! I'm not the type of to get flustered by such things. Still, I'm glad you came to say hello.

Ah, hello. I'm . I must tell you, it's nice to meet a friendly face, . It's so strange. I was visiting the campsite when someone invited me to move here. But when I arrived, they were gone. JustGONE! Was it something I said? Was it something I wore? I know my bold fashion sense and even bolder personality can be intimidating, buthow rude! Anyhoo, I hope you're having better luck here than I am. Though my luck is looking up now that I met you.

Oh, hello. I think this is the first time we've met, yes? <10_10 />AAACHOOO!<10_9 /> I really should have introduced myself sooner. My name isis AAACHOOO!<10_9 /> So sorry. I'm not sure, but I might have caught this cold while visiting the campsite. While I was there, one of the residents invited me to move here for goodso here I am.Thoughthey don't seem to be here any momoMORE<10_10 />CHOOO!<10_9 />Oh dear. Let's talk again when I'm not so sneezy, .

Why, hellooo there, darling! What a pleasure to meet you.I hope you're ready for a whole lot of —that's me! Because I have moved here for good! It was who invited me while I was visiting the campsite. And I couldn't resist. So here I am! I'll be tidying up my place today, but please do come over any time you like, .

Why hello, I'm . So you're , eh? I've heard ALL about you, my dear. Oh, not to worry. Your neighbors have had nothing but good things to say, I assure you. In fact, when I was at the campsite visiting, I heard the most fabulous things about this place. Then suggested I move here. So I threw caution to the wind and made this my home! With folks like you as my neighbor, clearly is where I'm meant to be, .

Why, I don't believe we've met before. I'm . How do you do? I must say, was not wrong about . Magnificent doesn't even describe it! invited me to move here during my visit to the campsite, you see. What a bit of luck that was. And now that I've met you, I feel destiny is truly on my side, darling.

Ah, hello! A pleasure to meet you. I'm . I'm your future best friend, darling. Anyhoo, so there I was, just a little ol' visitor at the campsite, having a chat with Then, all of a sudden, they up and suggested I move here for good!Now, I am not one to move to any ol' island, of course. It must speak to me, my dear. It must call my name! Well, not only called my name, it practically begged me to move here. So here I am! I see that you too heard the call of . How could we not be the best of friends?

<10_10 />AAACHOOO!<10_9 /> Oh dearone moment <10_10 />AAACHOOOOOOO!<10_9 /> Oh , hello there. I'm . Pleased to meet <10_10 />AAACH-YOOOU!<10_9 /> invited me to move to while I was visiting the campsite. Oh dear! Not again! AAACHOOOOOO!<10_9 /> I'd love to chat more, but I'm afraid I might give you this dreadful cold. What say we chat again when I'm not a walking petri dish?

Why hello and, eh, please excuse the mess. Normally I'm very tidy, but I just moved here TODAY! Anyhoo, I'm . I must tell you, moving here has NOT gone as expected.I was visiting the campsite when SOMEONE invited me to move here for good. But when I got here today, that SOMEONE was gone! It was ratherdisappointing. I don't mean to complain. Now that I've met you, I'm sure I'm going to love it here, .

Ah! A new face! Hello! I'm .You may have heard that I used to be a visitor at the campsite. But then I was invited to move here for good! It's no surprise. I can be very charming when I want to be. Too bad the person who invited me up and moved away. I was so sure we'd become the best of friends. Ah well, you're here now and that's all that matters. We'll be besties in no time, .

Ah, you must be , yes? I've heard all about you. I'm . <10_10 />AAACHOOO!<10_9 /> <10_10 />AAACHOOO!<10_9 /> AHHHHH<10_10 />CHOOOOOOOOO!<10_9 /> I'mI'm so sorry. Where was I? Oh yesI was invited to live on this island during a visit to the campsite.Everyone said such nice things about this place and the folks who live herehow could I refuse? <10_10 />HAAAAAACHOOO!<10_9 /> What IS this? Allergies? A cold? Something worse? <10_10 />BLAAACHOOOIE!<10_9 /> Let's talk again later, darling. Whatever this isyou don't want it.
